subSections.title: Derived characters
subSections.text:
* [[Index:Chinese radical/夊]]
* {{l|mul|[[愛]], [[畟]], [[憂]]}} <!-- Characters containing 夊 but listed under a different radical -->

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: This character is usually written as the bottom component of a character and is not to be confused with {{l|mul|夂}} which is often written as the top component of a character or {{l|mul|攵}} which is often written as the right component of a character. Traditionally, this character is written with the final [[㇏]] stroke slightly protruding above {{l|mul|ク}}.
